definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: Never use the fork to overturn the pallet.
sentences.chinese: 不準用貨叉挑翻貨盤的方法取貨。

sentences.english: We carried an average load of seventy-five people and three pallets in a combat environment.
sentences.chinese: 在作戰環境下我們平均搭載75名人員和三個貨盤。

sentences.english: We usually use cargo trays to make slings for bulk cargo.
sentences.chinese: 我們通常用貨盤給散貨做關。
